snippet: A Time/CNN ORC International survey also shows that nearly half of Republicans likely to vote in the primary could change their minds in the next two weeks.
abstract: A Time/CNN ORC International survey also shows that nearly half of Republicans likely to vote in the primary could change their minds in the next two weeks.
lead_paragraph: Now that Iowa's caucus is over, the candidates' standings are rolling in from the next set of states in the primary lineup. And more poll results are expected before the day is over.

headline.main: Romney and Santorum See Bounce in South Carolina Poll
